sense.def: Illness Sign identical with she jiang 舌強 , tongue stiffness. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 1: 驚悸恍惚，少 顏色，舌本強，善憂悲，是為心氣之虛也 , “Fright with palpitation and absent-mindedness, loss of complexion, tongue base stiffness , a tendency to worry and mourn: these are [the signs of] heat qi depletion”. She bu neng yan 舌不能言 , the tongue cannot speak [1]

Illness Sign identical with she an 舌喑 , muteness. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 39: 大迎：一名髓孔…足 陽明脈氣所發，灸三壯，主寒熱，頸瘰癧，癲疾，口瘑，喘…口不收， 舌不能言，不得嚼 , “The [needle insertion hole] da ying : an alternative name is sui kong …This is where the qi of the foot yang brilliance vessel effuses. When cauterized with three cones, it controls alternating sensations of cold and heat, scrofula pervasion-illness at the neck, ailments of peak-illness, wry mouth, panting…when one is unable to close the mouth, the tongue is unable to speak , and [patients] are unable to chew”. She che 舌坼 , tongue fissures [3]

Illness Sign of fissures developing on the tongue surface. In severe cases the fissures may release blood. Lei gong pao zhi lun 雷公炮炙論 Xu 序：口瘡舌坼，立愈黃蘇 , “Mouth sores and tongue fissures are cured instantaneously with [ gen ] huang and [ zi ] su ”.
